import React, {useEffect, useRef} from 'react'; import styles from './Swap.module.css'; import ButtonComponent from './button'; import RubLogo from './rub.svg'; import RmbLogo from './rmb.svg'; import UsdtLogo from './usdt.svg' function Swap() { let from = useRef(0.0) let to = useRef(0.0) useEffect(() => { if(!from.current.value || !to.current.value) { from.current.value = 0.0; to.current.value = 0.0; } }, []); return (

From

{ to.current.value = (from.current.value * 13.85).toFixed(2) }}/>
~RUB

To

{ from.current.value = (to.current.value / 13.85).toFixed(2) }}/>
~RUB
Цена:
13.85 RUB per 1 USDT
Комиссия:
1%
Route:
TON > USDT
Swap
); } export default Swap;
